commit.message:
- Add 'jdk.static' in VMProps. It can be used to skip tests not for running on static JDK.
- Add WhiteBox isStatic() native method. It's used by VMProps to determine of it's static at runtime.
- Add in '@requires !jdk.static' in test/hotspot/jtreg/runtime/modules/ModulesSymLink.java to skip the test on static JDK since it requires bin/jlink.
